title: Day 988
content:
# Day 988

100k Bitcoin holy crap.

![Random good news](https://miro.medium.com/1*vmDJrJmj5nqxUWyyW2k_GA.png)

Dinosaurs with laser eyes.

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*_OvKdH4Ep5pydhhz90eDEQ.png)

Man I am so grateful. I posted the following on LinkedIn.

![[https://www.linkedin.com/posts/conorchepenik_weve-got-presidents-posting-bitcoin-charts-activity-7270295796149899264-hzUh?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop](https://www.linkedin.com/posts/conorchepenik_weve-got-presidents-posting-bitcoin-charts-activity-7270295796149899264-hzUh?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop)](https://miro.medium.com/1*zXSLUID-IIR-T_xTE-uJOQ.png)

![](https://miro.medium.com/0*IQMNQ4yG8V-eN7QG)

Still in disbelief. WHAT A DAY! DECEMBER 4th 2024.

I will remember this day for the rest of my life.

12/4/24

Conor Jay Chepenik
